posts.title: Cassette Tape iPhone Case
posts.content: Turn your regular iPhone into a classic looking cassette tape with this cool iPhone case. The cassette tape case is flexible, sturdy, has openings for all the cable slots, and you can choose between a variety of colors for this cool novelty iPhone case.

posts.title: Collapsible Beer Glass
posts.content: Be ready to knock one back at a moment’s notice like a true alcoholic by carrying along this collapsible beer glass. Whenever the opportunity to enjoy a nice frosty one comes up, you only need to flick your wrist and your trusty glass magically extends before your eyes.

posts.title: Zipper Bookmark
posts.content: The story will be just part of the amusement when using the zipper bookmark to save your reading place. This creatively designed bookmark holds up very well to daily use and the fun zipper shape makes it easy to spot where you last left off.

posts.title: Baby Batman Walker
posts.content: Ensure your pint-sized Caped Crusader moves around the house in style by placing him inside this baby Batman walker. Modeled after the iconic Batmobile, it features an easy-swivel steering wheel and gear shifter in addition to flashing lights and cool sound effects.

posts.title: Banner Shaped Sticky Notes
posts.content: Turn every announcement into a celebration by stating it with the banner shaped sticky notes. Whether you’ve bought the office a box of donuts or want a creative way of announcing you’re pregnant, these colorful notes will get your message across loud and clear.

posts.title: App Controlled Robot
posts.content: Command control of your very own rover with the app controlled robot. This little fella sports a tough compact body and can be controlled with your smartphone so you can easily maneuver it as it performs all sorts of tricks while zooming around.

posts.title: Ninja Rubber Duckies
posts.content: These ninja rubber duckies pack a punch with any ancient Japanese bathroom decor scheme. Designed to look like rubber duckies gone ninja bad, you can pit these little dudes in death matches against one another, all while you are relaxing in the tub.

posts.title: Switchblade Mustache Comb
posts.content: Perform daily maintenance on your mustache ride with help from this switchblade mustache comb. It’s small enough to fit comfortably in your pocket so you can keep your glorious lady pleasing whiskers looking distinguished at all times

posts.title: Giant Strawberry Donut Pool Float
posts.content: Satisfy your craving on a hot day with the donut pool float. Coated in a vibrant pink icing and topped with colorful sprinkles, this durable vinyl donut is just what you need to let your troubles melt away as you cool off and float in total relaxation.

posts.title: The Manly Art Of Knitting
posts.content: Learn how to become a true badass with a pair of needles by reading The Manly Art of Knitting. Originally published in 1972, this practical guide provides step-by-step instructions for beginners alongside helpful illustrations and images.

posts.title: Instant Bag Hanging Clip
posts.content: Avoid having to place your designer bag on the dirty floor by carrying around this instant bag hanging clip. Simply open up the circular accessory and place one of the rubberized ends on the table’s edge to conveniently hang your bag right beside you.

posts.title: Minecraft Masks
posts.content: Convert your boring face into a blocky and pixelated form with these Minecraft masks. These geeky officially licensed one size fits all cardboard Minecraft masks feature Steve and the infamous Creeper as a bundle package, but can also be purchased individually.
